reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose Lurline House because of the reviews on this website. We stayed for three nights and thoroughly enjoyed it. Peter has thought of everyhing- from the warm welcome (and being picked up from the station) to the beautiful rooms, delicious breakfasts, friendly service and much more- there have to be some surprises! We would thoroughly recommend this guest house as a base for a stay in the Blue Mountains.
reviews.title: Everything was perfect!

reviews.text: Stayed in Lurline House following Trip Advisor's reviews and was not disappointed. Husband and I with two friends went to enjoy the Yulefest (at the Chalet). Peter is a true gentleman, his wife is lovely and his staff are so friendly. What a great atomosphere at Breakfast; you can chat with Peter as he cooks up your breakfast delights. Comfortable, beautiful, gracious appointments and centrally heated!! Peter even sorted us a take away breakfast box on our last morning as we were leaving very early to travel home. Lurline House is just a 10 minute walk to the Cafes and 3 Sisters, Ehco Point etc. Enjoyed an evening Port on the Chesterfield listening to Il Divo, this is the life. Hope to enjoy this type of hospitality again.
reviews.title: Fabulous B8B in Katoomba

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'm a bit late writing this review as my husband and I stayed at Lurline House on 4th and 5th of May this year. After reading all the great reviews on Trip Advisor, I was a hopeful but a little frightened I might be disappointed. I need not have been. It was everything the reviews said and more. Peter was the perfect host - he made us feel at home and helped us out with dining venues and ways to see Katoomba. The breakfast was delicious - Peter makes the best omelette and needless to say the room was picture perfect and spotlessly clean. These things and all the extra little touches mentioned in the other reviews (sadly missing in many B & B's we have stayed at) put it head and shoulders above the rest. My one regret is that though our room was lovely, we didn't go the whole hog and book the spar room - something to look forward to next time.
reviews.title: Lurline House - ambience, quality and the best customer service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: P.S. I would be remiss if I didn't mention Peter's great breakfast staff - their customer service is to be congratulated.
reviews.title: The Best by Far

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here for one night on the 2/07/09 and was surpised that the whole experience execeded my expectations after reading the previous reviews.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel, Excellent Service

reviews.text: I'm not going to write loads as previous travellers have already said it!

reviews.text: You will not regret staying at Lurline House, it's been the best B and B we have EVER stopped in!
reviews.title: This B & B is the best!

reviews.text: Peter (the host!)
reviews.title: Superb B&B - a Gem!
Cosy comfort in the mountains

reviews.title: fantastic bed and breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent stay.
reviews.title: I agree

reviews.text: Complimentary afternoon tea with cakes, complimentary port, relaxing ambience, good breakfasts, informative and helpful hosts, very comfortable rooms and beds, easy walking distance to 3 sisters and the town centre.
reviews.title: I agree with everyone here - simply excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very enjoyable and we were sad to leave!
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.text: I agree with everyone here - simply excellent
reviews.title: Can I please live there forever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The welcome is great, the breakfast is great, the rooms are amazing. Did some walking in the blue mountains and had a excellent stay.
reviews.title: peaceful retreat with first class service

reviews.text: 1st time in Sydney, booked the hotel based solely on advise from tripadvisor. Booked thru the hotel web site. Reply was quick and efficient. Beautiful house, Peter was a wonderful host, giving us tips where to go and dine. Yes, tea/coffee, chocolates and cakes were served when we arrive at 10.30 am, and it is free of charge! The chocolate cake was delicious. We were given the rooms even though check in was 2pm. Breakfast was delicious! Free internet access and parking. Overall, a wonderful stay!
reviews.title: Great hospitality, excellent breakfast !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had two nights at Lurline. The rooms are great. Comfortable and clean. Spa bath, Four poster bed. Very pleasant guest sitting room complete with fruit baskets and port and choice of a range of things from the kitchen which come morning converts to a kitchen where our host cooks up a storm in the form of a brilliant full English breakfast. I guess as the owner hails from Cornwall that is very apt. To top it off you can get plenty of advice where to go what to do etc. This is a very nice B&B.
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived late afternoon and while we went to the room Peter produced home made cakes and tea in lovely China cups, all complementary and a very relaxing and civilised way to start our stay.
reviews.title: This really is as good as all the other reviews say

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a standard room which had a lovely four poster bed. Breakfast was one of the best we have ever had (and that includes Raffles in Singapore where we stayed later on our trip).
reviews.title: the best b&b we have tayed at

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you stay here a good place to eat just up the road is the Gallery restaurant.
reviews.title: It's the Best!
